name: 3D Game Project (1st Quarter)
description:
Basic 3D Game Project for the course, Video Game Design and Development.

In this demo, you will travel around three mazes. Your goal is to fall through the green goal at the last level and your long-lost 'freedom' is the endless void that awaits you. :)

[Objectives]:

- Find the key (a yellow cylinder hidden in a random dead-end of the three levels)

- Find the end (which is in one of two corners) -- a barrier is placed that can be eliminated with the key found in the maze

[Bonus Objectives]:

- Collect the red and blue spheres found throughout the maze before moving on to the next one.
